pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, September 5, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, September 5, 2016:

Hangzhou, People’s Republic of China

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the G20 working Session “More Effective and Efficient Global Economic and Financial Governance”

Closed to media

12:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the G20 working Session “Robust International Trade and Investment”

Closed to media

1:55 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the G20 working Session “Inclusive and Interconnected Development”

Closed to media

3:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the G20 working Session “Other Issues Affecting World Economy”

Closed to media

5:05 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the G20 Closing Ceremony

Closed to media

6:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability

10:15 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will depart for Hong Kong, Special Administrative Region of the People’s Republic of China


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
